modelSelector.title: Select AI Model
modelSelector.noKeysSet: Please set an API key in Settings to select models.

initialState.welcomeMessage: To start chatting, please add your API key in the settings.

error.apiKeyMissingMessage: To use this feature, please set your API key in Settings first.
error.genericSaveError: Oops! Something went wrong while saving. Please try again.
error.genericLoadError: Hmm, we couldn't load your data right now. Please check your connection or try again in a bit.
error.invalidApiKeyMessage: The API key you entered seems to be invalid. Please check it and try again.
error.apiClientInitFailed: Failed to initialize AI service. Please check your connection or API key.
error.messageMappingFailed: Could not process the message for the AI service.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.streamError: An error occurred while streaming the response.

toast.apiKeyRequired: API Key required. Please go to Settings.
toast.errorSavingSettings: Couldn't save settings. Please try again.
toast.apiKeyNotSet: API Key not set. Please add it in Settings.

chat.noApiKeyMessage: To start chatting, please set up an API key in the settings.
chat.sendFailedNoKeyToast: No API Key configured. Please set one in Settings.
chat.startConversationPrompt: Your AI assistant is ready! Send a message to start the conversation.

drawer.deleteChatConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the chat "{{chatTitle}}"? This action cannot be undone.
drawer.chatDeletedError: Failed to delete chat '{{chatTitle}}'. Please try again.

chatHistory.title: Chat History

chatHistory.deleteError: Failed to delete chat. Please try again.

editMcpConnectionSheet.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP connection?

editMcpConnectionSheet.connectionFailed: Could not connect to the server. Please check the URL and try again.
